issue.title: scene_info does not reflect older changes to visuals

content.raw:
Thanks @faichele. The primary problem with your patch is the number of new publishers and subscribers that will be created. A complex robot, such as Atlas or PR2, will create a lot of new topics and introduce overhead.

Can you explain in more detail why you didn't use the `~/model/modify` topic? Is there a case where this topic does not work?
